coreAttributes.name: tight latex leggings
coreAttributes.description: A pair of tight latex leggings that are butter-soft to touch and shiny to behold. Form fitting even without the arcane, they are sure to fit tightly and snugly to anyone that wears them.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the latex leggings, before pulling them up and fastening the zip at [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the latex leggings, before pulling them up and fastening the zip at [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the latex leggings, before yanking them up and fastening the zip at [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the zip on [npc.her] latex leggings, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the zip on [npc2.namePos] latex leggings, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the zip on [npc2.namePos] latex leggings, before yanking them off.
